scripts.dev:frontend: sh -c 'ulimit -n 10240 2>/dev/null; cd frontend && npm run dev -- -p 3001'
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && (test -d venv && . venv/bin/activate || . venv312/bin/activate) && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:all: sh -c 'ulimit -n 10240 2>/dev/null; exec concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"'
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && (test -d venv && . venv/bin/activate || . venv312/bin/activate) && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && (test -d venv && . venv/bin/activate || . venv312/bin/activate) && pytest
